Properties.Name: ReturnType
Properties.Description: The type of return key to display on the keyboard.

Properties.Name: IsPassword
Properties.Description: Whether the entry masks the input for passwords.

Properties.Name: ClearButtonVisibility
Properties.Description: Visibility behavior for the clear button on supported platforms.

Events.Name: Completed
Events.Description: Raised when the user finishes text entry (e.g., presses return).
